title: Instruction manual
description: An instruction manual on how to run DOS games on Windows and MacOS using DOSBox. This was done as an assignment for CSE 300 (Technical Communications).

title: News release
description: A news release notifying the undergraduate student body that there are upcoming elections in the Undergraduate Student Government (USG). This was done as an assignment for CSE 300 (Technical Communications).

title: Unplug: a collaborative project
description: Worked in a group with five other people to put together a solution to a real-world problem. The problem we chose to tackle was the negative impact technology is having in the classroom by distracting students from learning. This was done as an assignment for CSE 300 (Technical Communications).

title: Personal brand
description: This is a continual effort to improve oneself and to reflect that progress in one's professional career. Creating this website was the first step toward incorprating myself and selling my skill set to the highest bidder. In essence, this website will never be complete but will represent that constant forward momentum.
